text:
If content is king, context (as we all agree) is queen :crown:

Context can transform your SaaS content into users-acquiring assets. But it takes the right execution.

And that execution is hard. Well, there's a way around it. 

One of our Product-Led Storytellers at VEC detailed an easy way around it here :point_down::

<https://victoreduoh.com/saas-contextual-marketing-for-user-acquisition/|https://victoreduoh.com/saas-contextual-marketing-for-user-acquisition/>

attachments.service_name: VEC | Product-led storytelling SaaS content agency
attachments.title: SaaS Contextual Marketing: Turning Your Content Into Users-Acquiring Assets
attachments.text: Dive in and see how to approach SaaS contextual marketing. You'll also get practical steps on how to use It for users' acquisition
attachments.fallback: VEC | Product-led storytelling SaaS content agency: SaaS Contextual Marketing: Turning Your Content Into Users-Acquiring Assets

text:
If you’re keeping an eye on trends in the SaaS industry like I am, you’ve probably noticed the phenomenal growth of AppSumo.

This year they expect to make over $74 million in annual revenue. And a whopping 49.59% (37 million) of that is from email marketing.

So I wrote an article about the email marketing strategies they used to get these results. I thought you and your audience might like it.

Here’s the link: <https://nerdyjoe.com/appsumo-saas-email-marketing-strategy/>

attachments.title: Inside AppSumo's Killer 37 Million Per Year SaaS Email Marketing Strategy - Ernest Bio Bogore
attachments.text: Learn how to approach saas email marketing from AppSumo's 37+ Million email marketing strategy.
attachments.fallback: Ernest Bio Bogore: Inside AppSumo's Killer 37 Million Per Year SaaS Email Marketing Strategy - Ernest Bio Bogore
